Accelerometer.summary: NOTE Experimental The Accelerometer interface of the Sensor APIs provides on each reading the acceleration applied to the device along all three axes.

remarks.para: To use this sensor, the user must grant permission to the 'accelerometer', device sensor through the Permissions API.
This feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.

AccelerometerAccelerometer.summary: NOTE Experimental The Accelerometer() constructor creates a new object which returns the acceleration of the device along all three axes at the time it is read.

AccelerometerX.summary: NOTE Experimental The x read-only property of the interface returns a number specifying the acceleration of the device along its x-axis.

AccelerometerY.summary: NOTE Experimental The y read-only property of the interface returns a number specifying the acceleration of the device along its y-axis.

AccelerometerZ.summary: NOTE Experimental The z read-only property of the interface returns a number specifying the acceleration of the device along its z-axis.
